TEXT.TITLE: INVESTOR SELLS 10 PCT RB <RBI> STAKE
TEXT.BODY: Jeffrey Neuman, of Santa Monica, Calif., told the Securities and Exchange Commission he sold his entire RB Industries Inc stake of 341,210 shares, or 10.0 pct, of the total outstanding. Neuman, who transferred the stock nearly two years ago to the Tudor Trust, of which he is trustee, said the trust sold the entire stake in a private deal on June 9 at 11.00 dlrs a share. Reuter
